output_list.criticism: The mint function has an integer overflow in the calculation of the minted amount. The function uses the SafeMath library for multiplication and division, but it does not handle the potential overflow that can occur when the total supply of tokens exceeds the maximum allowed supply.

The mintCoins function has an integer overflow in the calculation of the amount to be minted. The function uses the SafeMath library for multiplication and division, but it does not handle the potential overflow that can occur when the total supply of tokens exceeds the maximum allowed supply.

The burn function has an integer overflow in the calculation of the amount to be burned. The function uses the SafeMath library for subtraction, but it does not handle the potential overflow that can occur when the balance of the sender's account exceeds the maximum allowed supply.

The GetMaxStageEthAmount function has an integer overflow in the calculation of the maximum stage ETH amount. The function uses the SafeMath library for multiplication and division, but it does not handle the potential overflow that can occur when the stage sum exceeds the maximum allowed supply.
